name: voyeuristic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or typical of a voyeur (= someone who gets pleasure from secretly watching other people, especially in sexual situations): There is a voyeuristic thrill in looking at a photograph of someone's front room, complete with personal belongings. People like to watch fight videos online; there's always this voyeuristic fascination with violence. See
voyeur
More examplesFewer examplesThe project is designed to play on the public's voyeuristic tendencies.Some found the show too voyeuristic or exploitative.Despite the voyeuristic appeal of their subject matter, the films adopt a thoughtful, compassionate tone.
